frontmatter.title: Teaching Assistant and Support for Deep Learning Certificate Program

node.html:
• Responsible for developing content for assignments and in course code-walkthroughs
  • Conduct one-to-one online support and doubt clarification sessions
  • Review and Evaluate coding assignments

Worked extensively on are and but is not restricted to computer vision and deep learning. My research focuses on developing computation tools and deep learning models to facilitate high dimensional visual signals -- this encompasses ideas across multiple disciples:

  • Computer Vision
  • Deep Learning
  • NVIDIA TX
  • Signal Procesing
  • Compressive sensing
  • Neuromorphic engineering
  • Computational imaging

• Built Neuromoprhic Ego-cenric vehicle Activity Recognition
  • Acquired "A Large Scale Neuromorphic Vehicle Activity Dataset"
  • 2 arXiv paper published (*links to be updated soon)
  • Patent Filing underway
